title: Singer Lata Mangeshkar, ‘Nightingale of India,’ Dies at 92
sub_head: Ms. Mangeshkar’s distinctive vocals were dubbed over lip-syncing actors in lavishly choreographed Bollywood musicals
body:
NEW DELHI—Lata Mangeshkar, an Indian singer and cultural icon who enchanted generations of Bollywood audiences, died on Sunday at Breach Candy Hospital in Mumbai. She was 92.
Ms. Mangeshkar died of complications from Covid-19 after weeks of hospitalization, Indian news outlets quoted her doctor as saying. India declared two days of national mourning with the country’s flag flying at half-staff and said Ms. Mangeshkar would be given a state funeral, according to national broadcaster Doordarshan.
